briefTitle: Study for the Treatment of Crohn's Disease With Adacolumn

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Key Inclusion Criteria:

* Moderate to severe Crohn's disease
* Adequate peripheral venous access
* Agree to participate in the required follow-up visits
* Able to complete a diary
* Signed written informed consent document and authorization for use of protected health information

Key Exclusion Criteria:

* Extremely severe Crohn's disease
* Known obstructive symptoms within the past 3 months
* Presence of toxic megacolon
* Major surgery within the past 6 weeks or anticipated need for surgery within 12 weeks
* Total colectomy, ileostomy, stoma or 100 cm of resected small bowel
* Requiring in-patient hospitalization
* A history of allergic reaction to heparin or heparin-induced thrombocytopenia
* A history of hypersensitivity reaction associated with an apheresis procedure or intolerance of apheresis procedures
* A history of severe cardiovascular or peripheral arterial diseases
* A history of cerebral vascular diseases
* Liver diseases
* Renal insufficiency
* Known bleeding disorder or use of concomitant anticoagulant therapy for purposes other than apheresis treatment
* Any hypercoagulable disorder
* Known infection with Hepatitis B or C, or HIV
* Severe anemia
* Leukopenia or granulocytopenia
* Evidence of current systemic infection
* Malignancy
* Pregnant, lactating or planning to become pregnant during the course of the investigational study
* Used within the last 30 days, an investigational drug, biologic or device or 5 half-lives, if known, for any investigational drug or biologic

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Remission
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinical Remission is defined as a Crohn's Disease Activity Index (CDAI) score of ≤150 when evaluated at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Frequency and Severity of Adverse Events Through Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: All subjects who received at least one apheresis treatment session were included in the intent-to-treat population (ITT). The ITT population was used for effectiveness analysis.

outcomeMeasures.title: CDAI Score Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: 601-point, ordinal scale which quantifies the symptoms of patients with Crohn's Disease from 0 (complete remission) to 600 (most severe active disease). Mean change=Week 12 Mean CDAI-Baseline Mean CDAI

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Response
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinical Response is defined as a ≥ 100-point reduction in the CDAI scores at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Short-Form 36 Questionnaire (SF-36) Physical Component Summary (PCS) Score
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale measuring general health of patients from 0 (low quality of life) to 100 (high quality of life), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Short-Form 36 Questionnaire (SF-36) Mental Component Summary (MCS) Score
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale measuring general health of patients from 0 (low quality of life) to 100 (high quality of life), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Inflammatory Bowel Diseases Questionnaire (IBDQ)
outcomeMeasures.description: 193-point, ordinal scale measuring disease-specific quality of life from 32 (low quality of life) to 224 (high quality of life). Mean change= Week 12 Mean-Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in EuroQol Score (Single Index)
outcomeMeasures.description: A continuous scale that is a cardinal index of health from 0 (no impairment) to 1 (most impairment), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in EuroQol Score (Visual Analog Scale)
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale which measures non-disease specific health-related quality of life from 0 (Worst imaginable health state) to 100 (best imaginable health state)

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Work Limitations Questionnaire (Time Management)
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale which measures the degree to which health problems interfere with certain aspects of job performance and productivity from 0 (limited none of the time) to 100 (limited all the time), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Work Limitations Questionnaire (Physical Demands)
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale which measures the degree to which health problems interfere with certain aspects of job performance and productivity from 0 (limited none of the time) to 100 (limited all the time), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Work Limitations Questionnaire (Mental-Interpersonal Demands)
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale which measures the degree to which health problems interfere with certain aspects of job performance and productivity from 0 (limited none of the time) to 100 (limited all the time), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Work Limitations Questionnaire (Output Demands)
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale which measures the degree to which health problems interfere with certain aspects of job performance and productivity from 0 (limited none of the time) to 100 (limited all the time), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Work Limitations Questionnaire (WLQ Index)
outcomeMeasures.description: 101-point, ordinal scale which measures the degree to which health problems interfere with certain aspects of job performance and productivity from 0 (limited none of the time) to 100 (limited all the time), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Crohn's Disease Endoscopic Index of Severity
outcomeMeasures.description: 26-point,ordinal scale that assesses the severity of Crohn's Disease from 0 (least severe) to 26 (most severe), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Subject Global Rating
outcomeMeasures.description: 7-point,ordinal scale that measures the subject's state of Crohn's Disease from 0 (totally inactive) to 7 (as bad as it gets), Mean change=Week 12 Mean -Baseline Mean

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in C-Reactive Protein
Clinical Response in Subjects With a CDAI Score Greater Than 300
outcomeMeasures.description: A clinical response is defined as a 70-point decrease in CDAI score.

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Response in Subjects With a CDAI Score Less Than or Equal to 300
outcomeMeasures.description: A clinical response is defined as a 70-point decrease in CDAI score

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Response Based on Previous Use of Tumor Necrosis Factor-Alpha (TNF-a) Inhibitors
outcomeMeasures.description: A clinical response is defined as a 70-point decrease in CDAI score

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Response Based on No Previous Use of Tumor Necrosis Factor-Alpha (TNF-a) Inhibitors
outcomeMeasures.description: A clinical response is defined as a 70-point decrease in CDAI score

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Response Based on Use of 5-Aminosylisalates During the Study
outcomeMeasures.description: A clinical response is defined as a 70-point decrease in CDAI score

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Response Based on no Use of 5-Aminosylisalates During the Study
outcomeMeasures.description: A clinical response is defined as a 70-point decrease in CDAI score
